function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient number of testing kits leading to infeasibility of large-scale COVID-19 testing.","Impact":"Delayed identification and isolation of infected individuals, leading to increased transmission and spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Increase production and distribution of testing kits, prioritize testing for high-risk individuals, develop alternative testing methods such as rapid antigen tests.","Technologies":"Rapid antigen tests, automation of testing processes, AI-powered diagnostic tools.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, individuals at high risk of severe illness from COVID-19.","Owner":"Health organizations, governments, manufacturers of testing kits."},{"Description":"Inability to distinguish COVID-19 symptoms from common flu, leading to challenges in determining testing criteria.","Impact":"Delayed or missed diagnosis of COVID-19 cases, resulting in unchecked spread of the virus and difficulty in containment efforts.","Mitigation":"Public education on COVID-19 symptoms, development of symptom-based screening tools, research on unique COVID-19 symptoms, prioritization of high-risk groups for testing.","Technologies":"Symptom-based screening tools, AI-powered diagnostic tools, telemedicine for remote symptom assessment.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health officials.","Owner":"Health organizations, governments, public health agencies."}]}
